Question: In 2009, this person and Dan Aykroyd provided voices for the Family Guy episode "Spies Reminiscent of Us".
Hints: This person is gifted with absolute pitch.
At the height of his career in the late 1980s, this person earned around $7 million per film and was a highly visible celebrity.
This person continued his film career in 1983's National Lampoon's Vacation, directed by Ramis and written by John Hughes.
